body: @mythmon I've added tests for the `SwitchBox` component, however I'm having trouble doing much more than `shallow` testing the `OptOutStudyFields` component. It seems there's an issue with `connectFormProps` not exposing the `WrappedComponent` we use for testing `connect`ed components. I reckon @Osmose can shed more light on this, but I'm thinking that in-depth form tests may have to be its own PR all together.
